note: Use your imagination with this one.
title: Candle Problem

note: This game calls it “monsters and munchkins” but it’s the same idea as the Orcs and Hobbits.
title: Orcs and Hobbits Problem

note: Use your imagination. Stop the video before you see the solution.
title: Mutilated Checkerboard Problem

note: Use your imagination, unless you have a bunch of carabineers lying around, which is what is demonstrated in class.
title: Cheap Necklace Problem

note: Get a piece of paper and a pencil. Draw the dots on the paper and then try the task. Stop the video before you see the solution.
title: Nine Dots Problem

note: You can click a button in the game to see the solution. You can also increase the number of discs to make it harder.
title: Tower of Hanoi

note: There are only two jugs in this one – there are several variations of this problem. Set it to “5 and 3 make 4.
title: Three Jugs Problem
